projects.title: Internet of Things : Remote Control Platform of Smart House
projects.description: The idea of the project was a result of a brainstorming in an international Event : RoboSense (http://www.robosense.org). I was among the 101 participants (Tunisia, Italy, Portugal, Czech Republic, France, Sweden). The main subjects of the brainstorming was about creating a prototype of a platform capable of controlling the house via Internet from all over the world.The platform contains mainly 3 projects :1- The UI on a Samsung Galaxy Tab : the application offers a Super High UI allowing the users to Turn On/Off the light, Open or Close the door. Activate or Deactivate the Alarm System and finally check the Temperature of the house. It allow also a hole administration of the users : Add, Delete, Grant Control Actions.2- The Server Side : a Web Server managing all the data. We used a Data Base in order to make it easier to store, edit, delete or fetch all the data about the house.3- The hardware side : in this project we built an electronic system based on an open source electronic Italian platform named ARDUINO. Also, we built a special communication system based on an ANDROID mobile phone. this phone is used as a router (Google Cloud Messaging based GateWay)

projects.title: Online Shared Agenda
projects.description: The idea came from Google Agenda but with much more simpler way to use. You can sign up, sign in then create, view or manage your to do list. We added some specific description for the event (We added types such as : exams, presentation, coffee break, dinner, cinema ... ). The application works only on Android Mobile Platforms with a charming orange design. More over, we thought of using the Cloud Technology offered by Google Company the GAE (Google App Engine Cloud Service). It was a challenging choice, the aim of it was to give for the end user the possibility to sign in from any android device and fetch his events as fast as it could get to the new device. Another important option we had developed was the notification service. Before 24 hours of each planned event your mobile phone will vibrate or ring showing you a notification at the status bar of your device.

projects.title: Wireless Temperature Sensor network supervision Platform
projects.description: The project is all about Internet of Things. Using existing sophisticated technologies we succeeded to create a platform for gathering the temperature values from the different department of the campus "Univ Lille 1". We used FlyPort from the OpenPicus company. It is a micro-controller with a Wireless (Wifi G) communication and including an EnOcean (Sans pile Sans File) frequency Transceiver.

projects.title: Open Source Solution for a Local Area Network
projects.description: Since the establishment of the ?rst network in the world, security is a major concern for Companies.To ensure this, a company involves various software tools and hardware components. In this context, our project consists of con?guring and deploying a centralized and secured company network using open source tools.Key words : Centralized Management, Data Security, Network Security,Network monitoring.

past_companies.title: Internship
past_companies.description: The Corporate Networks are nowadays more and more sophisticated and need well elaborated solution to prevent all kind of data loss. Based up on this idea, our internship consists on configuring and testing an Open Source Solution for a Local Area Network.The platform contains 4 parts :1- The proxy : PFsense proxy : DMZ, Captive portal, HTTP/HTTPS Filter2- The Domain Controller : The Samba : DNS Server, Active Directory3- The Data Loss Prevention : MyDLP : HTTP/HTTPS Filter4- Network and System Supervisor : Nagios : check ping, TCP, DNS, CPU, HTTP,FTP, DHCP
